name: Cereal Marshmallow Strawberry Milk
description: Sugary and Sweet Cereal Marshmallows sitting in a nice rich bowl of Strawberry Milk - http://diyordievaping.com/2015/12/25/cereal-marshmallow-strawberry-milk-diy-ejuice-recipe/
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: Okay, hear me out...this to me tastes like I had a bigass bowl of Frankenberry with almond milk, and just left the marshmallows floating in the milk. That's the taste after the initial mix, and when first on fresh cotton. After a few weeks, it's more like a custard made with that cereal milk...a light, sweet, almond strawberry custard with a hint of cereal marshmallows. This is some seriously good stuff!

Off the shake and during the first 10 days I wasn't sure what I was tasting.  Then something beautiful happens and a nice thick vanillaee, marshmallowee flavor and mouth feel dominate you very gently. The strawberry fades away and its flavor that can be missed with whatever else you dip.  Im a lazy squonker so if I have gotten tired of whatever I eleaf l filled up with, I just grab this and drip right on over it.
not my cup of tea i guess
Really enjoy this one!  Can't get enough!!

Can't get enough of this stuff. I try to keep 60mls on hand at all times. First real ADV I've found in 12 months of mixing. As a shake and vape, the INW Marzipan provides nice, creamy, fluffy notes straight-away. As time passes, the body of the profile fills out, becoming even more fluffy and sweet, without at any point becoming cloying or overpowering. It's mentioned in another review that this doesn't have much flavour. I kinda agree, but don't view this as a negative at all. It's a lovely, subtle & nuanced recipe. The subtlety is what makes this stuff work as an ADV I can keep coming back to. It just never becomes fatiguing. Awesome work right here.

Great recipe, cereal marshmallow flavor very foward in the first week, after a 1-2 steep the flavors meld into what I can best describe as a lucky charms cereal custard.  I have mixed this with and without the 1% sweetner, and also tried both 10% sucralose solution and TPA sweetner which is 5% EM / 5% Sucralose solution...It is definitely best mixed with the 1% TPA Sweetner, just a tip as the sweetner isn't even mentioned on this page

This is the first eliquid I mixed on my own and I keep coming back.  First few batches were without the Yellow Cake and it was still very good.  Vaping from the latest 120 ML with the YC after a week steep and it's that much better.

I have vaped about 90ml's of this recipe. Every time I feel it's seriously lacking in something. I don't get a lot of flavor from it as a shake and vape or even after 2-3 week steep. I think there is too many ingredients being used in an attempt to accomplish what should be a simple profile. The strawberry seems buried beneath everything else. However, the flavor isn't a bad one and I believe I'm in the minority.

If I'm looking for a strawberry milk, it's either this one or SkiddlzNinja's Clich√©.  This is a solid all-around strawberry vape, but the almond highlights make it something special. This one is worth breaking out the FW Yellow cake for.
